This is the official documentation for Stan.

* The [*Stan User's Guide*](stan-users-guide/overview.html) provides example models and programming techniques for coding statistical models in Stan.

* The [*Stan Reference Manual*](reference-manual/overview.html) specifies the Stan programming language and inference algorithms.

* The [*Stan Functions Reference*](functions-reference/overview.html) specifies the functions built into the Stan programming language.

* The [*CmdStan User's Guide*](cmdstan-guide/overview.html) documents the command-line interface to the Stan inference engine.


There are also separate installation and getting started guides for
the Stan interfaces in R, Python, and Julia.
